qas.question: Instead of faith, John Polkinghorne relies on what when it comes to the theory of materialism?
Who claims that materialistic science will never explain phenomena?
Polkinghorne believes in faith in materialism instead of what?

plausible_answers.text: an overly skeptical, narrow or reductivist approach to theorizing

qas.question: Why do critics agree with materialism?
